A slot that executes a listener with one argument.

Constructor

new(signal : Signal1<TValue>, listener : TValue -> Void, ?once : Bool, ?priority : Int)

Instance Variables hide inherited show inherited

enabled : Bool

inherited from msignal.Slot
Whether the listener is called on execution. Defaults to true.

listener(default,accessor) : TListener

inherited from msignal.Slot
metadata
:isVar
The listener associated with this slot. Note: for hxcpp 2.10 this requires a getter method to compile

once(default,null) : Bool

inherited from msignal.Slot
Whether this slot is automatically removed after it has been used once.

param : TValue

Allows the slot to inject the argument to dispatch.

priority(default,null) : Int

inherited from msignal.Slot
The priority of this slot should be given in the execution order. An Signal will call higher numbers before lower ones. Defaults to 0.

Instance Methods hide inherited show inherited

execute(value1 : TValue) : Void

Executes a listener with one argument. If param is not null, it overrides the value provided.

remove() : Void

inherited from msignal.Slot
Removes the slot from its signal.
